title: Adv VLSI Systems
description: An advanced treatment of VLSI systems analysis, design, and testing with emphasis on complex systems and how they are incorporated into a silicon environment. Credit is not allowed for both ECE 4130 and ECE 6130.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 3050 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3060 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3150 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
